summary: A small town seeking publicity tries to bring together the quintuplet grandsons of the town's oldest inhabitant. The old man and all five grandsons are played by the great Fernandel.
cast: Fernandel|Françoise Arnoul|Andrex|Michel Ardan|Edmond Ardisson|Georges Chamarat|Édouard Delmont|Paulette Dubost|Ky Duyen|Louis de Funès|Leopoldo Francés|Micheline Gary|René Génin|Denise Grey|Tony Jacquot|René Havard|Yette Lucas|Lolita López|Albert Michel|Darío Moreno|Nina Myral|Noël Roquevert|Jocelyne Bressy|José Casa|Gil Delamare|Georges Demas|Max Desrau|Jean Diéner|Édouard Francomme|Renée Gardès|Manuel Gary|Alinda Kristanscu|Marcel Loche|Yannick Malloire|Franck Maurice|Raphaël Patorni|Pâquerette|Philippe Richard
keywords: rural setting|brotherhood|animal in title|female nudity|older man younger woman relationship
title: Le mouton à cinq pattes
